song.title: Mr.Pizza - Fem
song.info:
Made for the Amiga demo Fem by the prank group Laxative Effects. I used the fake nick Mr. Pizza when making music for Laxative Effects.
All demos were ofcourse unserious, and were most of the time made in Amos. Most of the music I made for that constellation were crap, but this one are actually quite cool :D
I won't out the other members of LAX though :)
Btw. This was not a module. It's streamed with ADPCM decoder in Amiga demo.
Download & stream: http://dvibe.se/lofi_fem.html
